body.name: SweatBlock Clinical Strength Deodorant & Antiperspirant Solid for Men & Women, Clinical Sweat & Odor Protection, Coastal Fresh Scent - 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 40 mins
features: DEODORANT + ANTIPERSPIRANT | Use SweatBlock Clinical Protection [AM] deodorant antiperspirant on it’s own for moderate sweat control & odor protection. Use with SweatBlock Antiperspirant DRIBOOST [PM] Wipes for maximum sweat protection to control excessive sweat & odor. Wipes sold separately.

SMELL AMAZING. STAY CONFIDENT & COMFORTABLE | SweatBlock Deodorant Antiperspirant keeps you fresh and stops body odor all day long. Antiperspirant deodorant for both women & men. Verified pure & safe ingredients.

FRESH, COASTAL-INSPIRED FRAGRANCE | Breezy, fresh, clean, “unisexy” coastal scent. Antiperspirant deodorant for both women & men. Designed to work perfectly with SweatBlock DRIBOOST [PM] Antiperspirant wipes.
pH BALANCED & NON-IRRITATING | Easy, clean, smooth glide. You’ll love that SweatBlock Clinical Strength deodorant stick won’t stain your clothing or irritate your skin.
No animal testing. Free from Parabens, Phthalates, Formaldehydes, & Sulfates. Formulated, filled, & sealed in the USA!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stress sweating husband says this is the best
reviews.reviewText: My husband is a stress sweater. He sweats through his business shirts/undershirts, which is so strange because he hides the stress on his face but he’s dripping underneath. It’s mostly at work during meetings so I wasn’t 100% fully aware of the whole picture until he started doing zoom meetings from home and confided in me and said the words “stress sweat,” which I had never heard of. He was soo embarrassed and frustrated about it. Once he actually confided in me that it was “stress sweat” I went on a hunt to solve the problem doing tons of research on reviews, Tiktoks, etc…. I ordered many, many different products including padded t-shirts. None of them worked. Then one day I found this! He says this is the best one! He said “it didn’t work 100% the first day, but after the second day it solved the problem.” The proof is in his non-stained, dry shirts. He’s super relieved and happy with this product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really well
reviews.reviewText: I had used Axe for years more out of habit than anything, but it just wasn't getting the job done. Very pleased with this deodorant. Seems to control perspiration well and keeps odor away. It is more expensive than most deodorants, but it is a specialty one and it works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for Strong Odor
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant us perfect for my husband! All of a sudden his normal deodorant failed. This one saved us if you know what I mean haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Big guys #bigandtall
reviews.reviewText: Being a big and tall guy I am always over sweating until I used this deodorant and it truly is a sweat blocker and it really lasts 48 hours even through constant movement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a good antiperspirant. Prevents most of the sweat. It's has a nice smell. A fresh scent. This is my second time repurchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t help much
reviews.reviewText: Been dealing with hyper hydroids since I was about 7. It’s the best i found but still doesn’t work much. Still searching for something that will take care of most of my sweat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It actually works first deodorant I’ve had that works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: The only antiperspirant that I’ve found to work
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried lots of different products, this is the first one that can do the job for me.Not an overpowering scent, can leave white marks on dark clothing if you’re not careful. It’s on the expensive side but is worth it if you’re a heavy sweater.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am 43 years of age and have always been a swetty Betty under my arms. I shower daily but just have very sweaty arm pits. Not any more. Took me 43 years to find it, it's a little on the expensive side but lasts. I got the wipes which are amazing Rob one on at night and all day protection the next day. I have never been so happy with a product. If I could I would bulk buy this. Amazing I am a long term commited buyer. So happy I finally found something I can stop wearing black

I've tried a few brands over the years, most have over powering perfumes, and some don't work that well, well sweat block doesn't over power on the perfume front and I can work all day out in the sun and not smell any BO at all.I will be buying more it when I run low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I expected to be bone dry with this product but no such luck. It smells OK as a stick, but on my skin, I don't like it. I can smell it all day and it becomes cloying. It clashes with my perfume or body lotion.It's OK for someone who wears citrus scents and someone who wants it for odour and not wetness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product works well, stops excessive sweating only downside is very expensive. Arrived early
